timeline.bodyText: let's probably add something in OrcTester to exercise footer stats, and make sure, for example, there is nothing important set in the dummy stats entry
timeline.author: zzhao0

replies.bodyText: added file stats validation to the TestDecryption tests
replies.author: rschlussel

timeline.message:
Fix stats for dwrf encryption

Unencrypted stats need dummy entries for encrypted columns to ensure
backwards compatibility.

Set sequenceId for dwrf columnEncodings

Since we now set the column encoding, we must also set the sequence id.
This will always be 0 since non-0 values are only for flat maps.

Set sequenceId for dwrf columnEncodings

Since we now set the column encoding, we must also set the sequence id.
This will always be 0 since non-0 values are only for flat maps.
